participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Creative and hands-on, Jake enjoys expressing himself through music and gardening. He is a bit introverted and has a fear of clowns due to past experiences.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, Lily has a passion for music and education. She loves to write and is motivated to inspire young minds as a teacher.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.
